title: Foreign body in other and multiple parts of respiratory tract
chapter: Injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes
block: Effects of foreign body entering through natural orifice
inclusion: inhalation of liquid or vomitus NOS
exclusion: foreign body: accidentally left in operation wound
foreign body: in puncture wound - see open wound by body region
foreign body: residual, in soft tissue
splinter, without major open wound - see superficial injury by body region
